I just found this awesome Smartcoins Wallet that allows you to send and receive Smartcoins. Check it out! Cheers Invite one or more of your friends to try out the Smartcoins Wallet! Email addresses are not saved or collected by anyone so their privacy is assured. Awesome Smartcoins Wallet Share with a friend OPEN EMAIL APPLICATION Settings
